Minio.description: Minio is an S3-compatible object storage server
Minio.more_info: This Rock-on uses the official Minio Docker image to implement a single Minio instance with a single object storage share, suitable for use on a private network.  If your connections traverse a network you do not control, consider using a VPN for encryption.

/data.description: Choose a share for Minio object storage
/data.label: Minio Object Storage

MINIO_ACCESS_KEY.description: Minio Access Key (admin username), 1 to 128 alphanumeric characters
MINIO_ACCESS_KEY.label: Minio Access Key

MINIO_SECRET_KEY.description: Minio Secret Key (admin password), 1 to 128 alphanumeric characters
MINIO_SECRET_KEY.label: Minio Secret Key

MINIO_BROWSER.description: Web Portal admin access, on to enable, off to disable
MINIO_BROWSER.label: Web Portal Access
